Class ModbusDataNode

  • java.lang.Object

      • com.ge.dspmicro.machineadapter.modbus.api.ModbusDataNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends PDataNode
implements Cloneable
    Modbus data node definition
